MetaData.MetaDataItem: RF9534 - 600W Incandescent Smart Dimmer ASPIRE RF Dimmers replace regular switches or dimmers to provide local and remote ON/OFF/DIM/BRIGHT control and are compatible with incandescent lighting loads. ASPIRE RF Dimmers provide other programmable functions (scenes, events, association, child lockout, etc.) when used with Aspire RF or other Z-Wave compliant controllers*. (*Note: some specific ASPIRE RF features may not be programmable)

ChangeLog.Entry: Initial Metadata Import from Z-Wave Alliance Database - https://products.z-wavealliance.org/products/760/xml
